name: Pist Off
description:
Pist Off

A game made by ian-h-chamberlain for Bevy Jam #3.

Objective

Push all the colored blocks back into place in the cube. Watch out though, fixing one block might have some unintended side effects...

Controls

  • Rotate cube: WASD or Arrow keys
  • Push/pull blocks: left click
Known Issues

Web version has some visual artifacts on hover/click, and sometimes the blocks spawn in the wrong place initially (clicking them still works, but causes a "skip" in the animation).

Web version seems to have some performance issues while loading on x86_64 macOS (although it seems to run okay once loaded). If you click "Play" and it appears to freeze for a long time, try downloading the native macOS build to play instead.

Windows builds are untested because I don't have a Windows machine at the moment and it doesn't work under Wine :(

CreditsModels / textures / programming

Original by Ian Chamberlain

Font

Suwannaphum by Danh Hong
